## Scalars type

All built-in and custom scalars, mapped to their actual values

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Scalars = {
    ID: string;
    String: string;
    Boolean: boolean;
    Int: number;
    Float: number;
    Long: any;
    DateTime: any;
    Country: any;
    Locale: any;
    Date: any;
    Json: any;
    Currency: any;
    KeyReferenceInput: any;
    SearchFilter: any;
    SearchSort: any;
    YearMonth: any;
    BigDecimal: any;
    Time: any;
};
```
